name: Inn
description: It looks much smaller from the outside. There is a bar in the lobby. Across the room is the Inn keeper. He's a plump man with a long black beard. In the corner of the room sits three men drinking by a fireplace. They seem to be far beyond their first grog of the evening, and no signs of slowing down yet. On the opposite side a room sits a a man dressed in all black. His long sword hilted to his side.
